solution_line_template: Pastor Paul prays {paul_daily_prayers}*{days_in_week_excluding_sunday}=<<{paul_daily_prayers}*{days_in_week_excluding_sunday}={paul_prayers_weekday}>>{paul_prayers_weekday} days per week, except Sunday.
On Sunday, Pastor Paul prays {paul_sunday_multiplier}*{paul_daily_prayers}=<<{paul_sunday_multiplier}*{paul_daily_prayers}={paul_prayers_sunday}>>{paul_prayers_sunday} times.
Per week, Pastor Paul prays {paul_prayers_weekday}+{paul_prayers_sunday}=<<{paul_prayers_weekday}+{paul_prayers_sunday}={paul_total_weekly_prayers}>>{paul_total_weekly_prayers} times.

Pastor Bruce prays half as much as Pastor Paul does on all days except Sunday, for a total of {paul_prayers_weekday}/{bruce_weekday_divisor}=<<{paul_prayers_weekday}/{bruce_weekday_divisor}={bruce_prayers_weekday}>>{bruce_prayers_weekday} times.

Pastor Bruce prays twice as much on Sundays as does Pastor Paul, or {paul_prayers_sunday}*{bruce_sunday_multiplier}=<<{paul_prayers_sunday}*{bruce_sunday_multiplier}={bruce_prayers_sunday}>>{bruce_prayers_sunday} times.
In total, Pastor Bruce prays {bruce_prayers_weekday}+{bruce_prayers_sunday}=<<{bruce_prayers_weekday}+{bruce_prayers_sunday}={bruce_total_weekly_prayers}>>{bruce_total_weekly_prayers} times per week.

Thus, per week, Pastor Paul prays {paul_total_weekly_prayers}-{bruce_total_weekly_prayers}=<<{paul_total_weekly_prayers}-{bruce_total_weekly_prayers}={difference_in_prayers}>>{difference_in_prayers} more times per week than Pastor Bruce.
